API Reference

This section provides detailed documentation for the application’s modules and classes.

UI Layer

Logic Layer

class TaskManager(db_config)[source]

Bases: object

load_tasks()[source]

Load tasks from the database.

add_task(task_text)[source]

Add a new task to the database.

update_task(task_text, task_id)[source]

Update an existing task in the database.

delete_task(task_id)[source]

Delete a task from the database.

close()[source]

Close the database connection.

Database Layer

class Database(host, user, password, database)[source]

Bases: object

create_table()[source]

Create the tasks table if it doesn’t exist.

fetch_all_tasks()[source]

Retrieve all tasks from the database.

add_task(task_text)[source]

Insert a new task into the database.

update_task(task_text, task_id)[source]

Update a task in the database.

delete_task(task_id)[source]

Delete a task from the database.

close()[source]

Close the database connection.
